A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: There’s parts I love with this movie such as Kylo\, Rey\, and Luke’s scenes every single one of them and occasionally Leia as well. Then there’s the other 50% of this movie that left me feeling Meh every single time I watch it. I hated how much attention was put in Finn and Rose on Canto Bight and Poe\, Leia\, and Holdo and their whole situation. I felt like these were great characters that needed something better to do but instead it was boring the whole time. Because of this I just can’t ignore how much this movie is hard to watch without skipping a bunch of scenes.
